about_the_game:
Thirty years after his first adventure, Simon returns in a prequel packed with unpredictable events unfolding in the Magic World: a land populated by powerful (and mostly useless) wizards and absurd creatures.

Summoned by an ancient prophecy, Simon is torn away from his turbulent teenage life of school expulsions and unexpected house moves. This new world throws him into a series of dastardly puzzles to solve, alchemical contraptions to tinker with, powerful spells to learn and revolting stews to taste!



Whether this is your first trip to the Magic World or a return journey, Simon is back, along with his particular brand of humour and an all-new look!




  • Simon is back!

    Simon the Sorcerer Origins is the official prequel to the legendary Simon the Sorcerer series.



  • A great classic in a new guise.

    Rediscover all the charm of the original saga with all-new entirely hand-drawn visuals!



  • Time-honoured game mechanics meet a new world of magic.

    Tackle a wealth of puzzles, test your wits with classic point-and-click conundrums, find, use and combine items and clues, and face a wealth of absurd situations and characters in your quest to become a legendary sorcerer!
